transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kis se?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Sorry.
Executive: Ji?
Executive: Navej ji aap Alina International se baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ready na? Haan.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Ek second hold kijiye.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Haan, main actually sir business manager baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan wo kal aapse puri baat nahi ho pai thi na sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan, to main ye keh raha hun sir ki aapka ye kuch kuch buyleads hain jo humne socha tha ki aapko share karenge.
Customer: Ji bataiye. Haan bataiye.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To ye jo number hai sir aapka, main ek bar aapka whatsapp number jo hai, one second sir.
Executive: Ek to ye jo number hai sir jispe baat ho rahi hai jiske end mein 305 hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hai na? Iske alava bhi sir koi aur number hai aapke pass?
Customer: Nahi koi aur number nahi hai.
Executive: Na.
Executive: To ye wala number sir aapka hai whatsapp pe?
Customer: Haan isi pe hai whatsapp pe hai.
Executive: Achcha. Thik hai to isi pe na, isi wale number pe main bolta hun inko buyleads wagera share karne ke liye.
Customer: Record karne ki koi jarurat nahi hai kyunki ab mujhe isko chalana hi nahi hai na, aap ise band kara de aap se kal bhi request kiya tha maine.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir wo mujhe malum hai lekin maine aapko bola tha na ki sir kuch jo buyleads main aapko share kar raha hun.
Customer: Wo sab bekar hai wo sab bekar hai. Wo sab bekar chiz hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi, sir sir dekhiye jo 17 buyleads hum aapko provide karte hain, kya bolte hain hafte ka, main wo sara ka sara buyleads ki baat nahi kar raha hun. Main sirf aapse un buyleads ki baat kar raha hun jo jo hume lagega jaise usme out of 17 jo bhi do teen buyleads hume lagenge ki haa usse benefit mil sakta hai ya us pe response sahi mil sakta hai. Wo buyleads main aapko isi number pe share karwa raha hun. Aap pure din mein.
Customer: Nahi sir aap.
Customer: Sir pure.
Customer: Aap ye sab mat karwao. Aap seedhe seedhe mera jo hai wo cancel karwa do.
Executive: Sir wo possible ho pata to fir main aapko mana thodi karta sir.
Executive: Main chiz to ye hai na sir ki at least aapka ye jo chal hai services on a daily basis main aapse ye keh raha hun ki aap sare us pe mat connect kijiye jo hum share kar rahe hain ek bar aap us pe to connect kijiye aur uske baad bhi hum ek bar jo hai us pe karenge discussion sir. Aisa nahi hai ki hum usko chhod denge. Aapse hum dobara discussion karenge uske bare mein.
Customer: Hum koi buylead aapka nahi istemal karenge.
Executive: Sir main keh raha hun man lijiye ki usme se ek bhi buylead aapke kam ka nahi hota hai lekin hum ek bar jab tak un selective buyleads pe kam nahi karenge hume malum kaise chalega sir?
Customer: Sir maine sab parkh dekh liya hai wo sab time waste karne wali baat hai.
Executive: Sir abhi to wo aapne apne hisab se kiya hai na?
Customer: Nahi nahi wo chaliye koi alag se aap koi jadu thodi kar dijiyega usme.
Executive: Sir ek baat bataiye aaj ki date mein jo aapka account manager jo handle kar raha hai sir usko obvious si baat hai sir wo day in day out hamara kam hi yahi hai sir.
Customer: Dekhiye aap aisa hai ki aap mera ye jo hai return karwa do bas aur koi help aapse nahi chahiye mujhe. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to cancel the subscription.

- Does not want any buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to convince customer to use buyleads.

- Executive explained benefits of selective buyleads.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, cancellation, refund
